title: Jergens Lotion Recalled for Possible Bacteria Contamination
sub_head: Manufacturer Kao USA urges consumers to discontinue use of recalled lotion as a precautionary measure
body:
The company behind Jergens moisturizer is recalling some of its products over possible bacterial contamination.
Manufacturer Kao USA Inc. said that some 3-ounce and 10-ounce bottles of its Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer may contain small amounts of pluralibacter gergoviae, a bacterium that can lead to infections in people with compromised immune systems.
